questions.question: How can I sign up for a new account on this platform?
questions.answer: To sign up for a new account, look for the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage. Clicking this button should take you to a registration form. Fill out the form with your details, such as your name, email address, and preferred password. Once you've filled out the form, click the 'Submit' or 'Register' button to create your account.

questions.question: How can I enroll in a course on this platform?
questions.answer: After signing in to your account, navigate to the 'Courses' section of the platform. Browse through the available courses and click on the one you're interested in. You should see an 'Enroll' button on the course page. Click this button to enroll in the course. You'll receive a confirmation message once your enrollment is successful.
